abstract: Prosecutors dismiss criminal charges against Utah football player Dominique Hatfield after evidence emerges that he was not person who used knife in robbery, but leave open possibility of other criminal charges in connection with incident.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors are dismissing criminal charges against a Utah player who was kicked off the team, but they could file altered charges.

headline.main: Charges Are Dropped Against Utah Player
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | College Football; Charges Are Dropped

snippet: Prosecutors are dismissing criminal charges against a Utah player who was kicked off the team, but they could file altered charges.
